meanings.definition: A class of synthetic antibacterial drugs used to treat various infections.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed quinolones to help patients fight infections.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended quinolones for the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but quinolones crashed it!
meanings.sent4: In the battle against infections, quinolones are the superheroes.
meanings.sent5: Quinolones are like warriors fighting off the invading bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of synthetic antibacterial drugs derived from quinoline.
meanings.sent1: She researched the different types of quinolones available in the market.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the benefits of using quinolones for treatment.
meanings.sent3: The quinolones in the lab were having a dance-off with the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: His body welcomed the quinolones like long-lost friends.
meanings.sent5: The quinolones worked together to defeat the bacterial invaders.
